mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_role WHERE role_code = #{roleCode} AND deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT sp.perm_code FROM sys_role sr JOIN sys_role_permission srp ON sr.role_id = srp.role_id JOIN sys_permission sp ON srp.permission_id = sp.permission_id WHERE sr.role_id = #{roleId} AND sr.status = 1 AND sr.deleted = 0 AND sp.status = 1 AND sp.deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT sp.* FROM sys_role sr JOIN sys_role_permission srp ON sr.role_id = srp.role_id JOIN sys_permission sp ON srp.permission_id = sp.permission_id WHERE sr.role_id = #{roleId} AND sr.deleted = 0 AND sp.deleted = 0
SELECT sr.* FROM sys_role sr JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sr.role_id = sur.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.status = 1 AND sr.deleted = 0
